channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia says it has ‘visibility to a half a trillion dollars’ in revenue through 2026. That would make it one of America’s biggest companies
item.description: Nvidia, the AI chipmaker led by Jensen Huang, is on track to crack the top 10 of the Fortune 500.

item.title: Jensen Huang pours cold water on an AI bubble, and says ‘Nvidia is unlike any other accelerator’ in the boom
item.description: The world is undergoing three massive platform shifts at once, the CEO said, as the stock soared more than 6% in after-hours trading.

item.title: Dem congresswoman indicted for 'particularly selfish' alleged theft of FEMA relief funds for campaign use

item.title: House votes to repeal controversial Arctic Frost provision from government shutdown bill

item.title: Senators rail against 'cash grab' spending bill provision as House preps repeal vote
item.description: The Senate reached bipartisan unity in its fury over a recently passed law that would allow lawmakers to sue federal government and reap a massive amo...

item.title: Trump says he will meet NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani this week
item.description: President Donald Trump announced he will meet with New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani at the White House on Friday, November 21, 2024.

item.title: Epstein files to go public as Trump says he signed law authorizing release of records
item.description: President Donald Trump signed legislation allowing the Justice Department to release Jeffrey Epstein files, after the House voted 421-1 to approve the...

item.title: AI’s power and water consumption is worrying the agriculture sector: ‘Don’t forget that it is also required for us to grow food’
item.description: “Don't forget the humans in the equation," warned Gerard Lim, CEO of vertical farm startup Agroz at the Fortune Innovation Forum.

item.title: We Need To Deport 1 Million Illegal Immigrants A Month
item.description: Americans want zero illegal immigration, little or no legal immigration, and a mass deportation system that makes noticeable cultural changes to Ameri...

item.title: If You’re Still Freaking Out About the Israeli Beeper Operation, You’re Telling On Yourself
item.description: Israel’s victory is America’s, too — or should be.

item.title: Welcome To The Future, Where AI Grandma Raises The Kid You Bought From The Baby Bank
item.description: Fertility tech solved the 'problem' of your body's physical limitations. Now, a new app has solved that of your mother's.

item.title: Senators divided over government payout for Biden Justice Dept. spying on their phone records
item.description: The Senate is debating whether to repeal, expand or keep a new law that allows senators to sue the government for damages if their phone records are a...

item.title: Russia Is at Hybrid War with NATO
item.description: Putin’s only strategy seems to be more of the same, with one major exception.

item.title: Appeals court rules in favor of DHS on crowd control tactics in Chicago
item.description: A federal appeals court on Wednesday shut down a lower judge's orders that had tried to limit federal officials from using tear gas and other aggressi...

item.title: Someone Needs To Explain How An Illegal Alien Wanted For Terrorism Got A CDL License
item.description: Incredibly, the gold star on his license shows that he had enough documentation for PennDOT to issue a Real ID.

item.title: Teacher Claims Conflict Of Interest In Suit Against FCPS’s Alleged Retaliation
item.description: After Perez alleged a school staff member enabled a minor’s abortion, she says she faced multiple incidents of retaliation.

item.title: Democrats Will Rig The Midterms If Red States Let Them After Texas Ruling
item.description: Republicans in red states must step up or risk losing the House to Democrats permanently.

item.title: Trump Was Right the First Time on H-1B
item.description: There is no evidence that the visas meaningfully contribute to American competence or competitiveness.

item.title: We Don’t Know Where We Are in the Political Cycle
item.description: It’s premature to treat Trump as if he’s been president for the past five years.

item.title: Trump says he'll push for peace in Sudan after Saudi crown prince urged greater US involvement

item.title: Nvidia blows past revenue targets and forecasts trillions in AI infrastructure spending by end of decade
item.description: Strong revenue and “off-the-charts” GPU demand show Nvidia’s AI engine still roaring as CEO Jensen Huang delivers a beat-and-raise quarter

item.title: Pressure ratchets up on Congress to ban lawmakers from the stock market

item.title: Panera’s CEO unveiled a comeback plan—and it includes better ingredients like lettuce: ‘No one likes iceberg’
item.description: Panera, once considered the gold standard in American fast-casual dining, has fallen behind competitors like Chipotle and Panda Express.
